description: Update plugins to their latest compatible version. You can also specify particular plugins or groups of plugins to update. When specifying individual plugins you can provide a version number or semantic version (semver). Add the --check option for a summary of available updates for the given plugin(s). When using this option no changes are made. Note that in the unusual case that your Adapt project has a bower.json manifest in the root folder, this will be used to compile the list of plugins to update.
usage: update <target> [<target> ..] where target is the name of a plugin or group
